title: GO CARDS GO !!!!
body:
OH YEAH!!! GO CARDS GO!!! WOO HOO!!!

Oh yeah, by the way, the new blog is almost done... believe it or not.

WOO HOO!!!
author: Dan

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Wuh oh! The comments were down for the last 14 or so hours. All apologies to all 4 of you who tried to leave one.

comments.author: Oz
comments.body:
Aha! Your comments work again! And I cannot believe that the new blog is almost done, but I'm very excited to see it revealed. Then I will officially rename the link on my blog: "Moxie Blog." Or do you prefer "Moxie Cinema Blog"? How about "The Moxie Cinema's Blog"? You let me know, Danny boy.

But about the World Series. I'm routing for the team with red on.

comments.author: whitty
comments.body: well, Dan, if you are baseball fan, they just announced yesterday that they are moving a triple A team to Springfield -- the Springfield Cardinals.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Oh Yeah! That's going to be sweet! I heard they're going to be a farm team to the "REAL" Cardinals. WOOT! WOOT!

comments.author: justin
comments.body: Dan payed me to leave this comment.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Justin, the check is in the mail.

comments.author: Aaron
comments.body:
We want more Benzo!

And more Cardinal wins! Four more, to be exact.

comments.author: Aaron
comments.body: Oh, and the SPFD Cards are AA ball.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Don't you worry Aaron... you'll get more Benzo. I garauntee it!

comments.author: whitty
comments.body: double - triple - meh.  It is all far too close to my house.  The traffic is a pain.  And when they shoot off fireworks there, it scares the bejesus out of me.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Um Dan....no.  Being from Chicago, I have to root Sox.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Oops.  Forgot to add "Worst.  Post.  EVER."

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: Good!  The team with red on their uniforms won game one!

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body:
All this talk of baseball is somewhat over my head. (I assume it's baseball, anyway. They're wearing the hats. after all)

Want the big news from the English sporting scene? Arsenal just lost their unbeaten league record after 49 matches to the bitter rival Manchester United. Trust me, it's a big thing over here...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I've heard of Manchester United before! Yee haw!
